title: San Diego/La Jolla
name: Birch Aquarium at Scripps
price: $17 adults, $14 teens, $13 seniors, $12.50 children, $12 students, free for children age 2 and under
content: The public center for the renowned Scripps Institution of Oceanography (of University of California, San Diego), this award-winning aquarium has many fantastic exhibits, with oceanic species from all over the Pacific Ocean displayed, as well as sharks, a tide pool, a large kelp tank, and a coral reef (with actual living coral). The museum also has some spectacular views of the ocean and La Jolla as well as some nifty tide pools where you can touch tide-pool animals.
